name: leaflet-labeled-circle
description: Special type of SVG marker with a label inside and draggable around the anchor point

scripts.start: watchify -v -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -s L.LabeledCircleMarker demo/js/index.js -o demo/js/build.js & serve -p 3002
scripts.build: browserify -v -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -s L.LabeledCircleMarker -u leaflet ./index.js -o dist/L.LabeledCircle.js

author: Alexander Milevski <info@w8r.name>
